       Here is my proposal, seeing how were going to tare this ship to peices 
before either of us surrender, which I dont plan on doing and I know that Yan 
is far to stubborn to do so either, we might as well just allign. But, it 
dosent make much sense scince most of our attacks will be on the Allience and 
Maximals, both groups yan is leader of, or protecting. I dont like it, but a 
diplomatic agreement is alot quicker and cleaner than a military conquest. 

--part1_9f.de1d6e1.275ad0b0_boundary
